Title: Setting Up and Using Coupons on Xiaohongshu
Content: Setting up and using coupons on Xiaohongshu involves navigating the platform's backend and understanding the various promotional tools available. To start, access the marketing activities section in the Xiaohongshu backend. Here, you can create and manage different types of coupons and discounts. For instance, you can set up single-product promotions by naming the promotion, specifying the discount, and selecting the product. Multi-product promotions, such as 'buy more, save more' deals, can also be configured. These promotions can be tailored to offer discounts based on the total purchase amount, encouraging customers to buy more to save more. Additionally, Xiaohongshu offers various types of coupons like store coupons, product coupons, and newcomer coupons, which can enhance conversion rates and customer loyalty. By strategically setting up these coupons, you can attract more customers and boost sales.

Title: Understanding Marketing Calendars and Activities
Content: Understanding the marketing calendar and activities on Xiaohongshu is essential for effective campaign planning. The marketing calendar provides a schedule of upcoming promotional events throughout the year, allowing you to prepare in advance. For example, events like New Year sales, Valentine's Day promotions, and other seasonal activities are listed with their respective start and end dates. By reviewing this calendar, you can plan your marketing strategies and inform your followers about upcoming promotions. This pre-planning helps in creating a buzz and building anticipation among your audience. Additionally, the marketing activities section allows you to participate in various platform-wide events, provided your store meets the required criteria. These activities can significantly increase your store's visibility and attract more customers.

Title: Enhancing Conversion Rates with Various Coupons
Content: Enhancing conversion rates on Xiaohongshu can be effectively achieved through the strategic use of various coupons. Coupons like newcomer coupons, store coupons, product coupons, and live-streaming coupons can incentivize purchases and boost customer loyalty. For instance, newcomer coupons offer discounts to first-time buyers, encouraging them to make their initial purchase. Store coupons and product coupons can be used to promote specific items or overall store sales. Live-streaming coupons can be distributed during live sessions to engage viewers and prompt immediate purchases. Additionally, surprise coupons for items left in the shopping cart or repurchase coupons for returning customers can further enhance conversion rates. By offering these targeted discounts, you can create a more attractive shopping experience, encouraging customers to complete their purchases and return for future transactions.
